Inside Macintosh: Networking With Open Transport / Part 2 - Open Transport Reference
Chapter 29 - TCP/IP Services Reference

Functions

This section describes the functions provided by the TCP/IP service provider and the TCP/IP utility functions. In addition to these functions, you need the functions described in the chapter "Endpoints", in order to implement TCP/IP communications.

Resolving Internet Addresses
Opening a TCP/IP Service Provider
Getting Information About an Internet Host
Retrieving DNS Query Information
Address Utilities
